message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000. I'm confident it can greatly benefit you, even at this price.
I'm really interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $14,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While $22,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down slightly. How about we settle at $19,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $19,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $15,000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
